org.apache.tephra.persist

Class TransactionEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tephra.persist.TransactionEdit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class TransactionEdit
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Represents a transaction state change in the TransactionLog.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TransactionEdit.State
      The possible state changes for a transaction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionEdit

        public TransactionEdit()

    • Method Detail

      • getWritePointer

        public long getWritePointer()
        Returns the transaction write pointer assigned for the state change.

      • getVisibilityUpperBound

        public long getVisibilityUpperBound()

      • getState

        public TransactionEdit.State getState()
        Returns the type of state change represented.

      • getExpiration

        public long getExpiration()
        Returns any expiration timestamp (in milliseconds) associated with the state change. This should only be populated for changes of type TransactionEdit.State.INPROGRESS.

      • getChanges

        public Set<ChangeId> getChanges()
        Returns:
        the set of changed row keys associated with the state change. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTING or TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTED.

      • getCommitPointer

        public long getCommitPointer()
        Returns the write pointer used to commit the row key change set. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTED.

      • getCanCommit

        public boolean getCanCommit()
        Returns whether or not the transaction should be moved to the committed set. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTED.

      • getType

        public TransactionType getType()
        Returns the transaction type. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.INPROGRESS or TransactionEdit.State.ABORTED.

      • getTruncateInvalidTx

        public Set<Long> getTruncateInvalidTx()
        Returns the transaction ids to be removed from invalid transaction list. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.TRUNCATE_INVALID_TX

      • getTruncateInvalidTxTime

        public long getTruncateInvalidTxTime()
        Returns the time until which the invalid transactions need to be truncated from invalid transaction list. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.TRUNCATE_INVALID_TX

      • getParentWritePointer

        public long getParentWritePointer()
        Returns the parent write pointer for a checkpoint operation. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.CHECKPOINT

      • getCheckpointPointers

        public long[] getCheckpointPointers()
        Returns the checkpoint write pointers for the edit. This is only populated for edits of type TransactionEdit.State.ABORTED.

      • createStarted

        public static TransactionEdit createStarted(long writePointer,
                            long visibilityUpperBound,
                            long expirationDate,
                            TransactionType type)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.INPROGRESS state.

      • createCommitting

        public static TransactionEdit createCommitting(long writePointer,
                               Set<ChangeId> changes)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTING state.

      • createCommitted

        public static TransactionEdit createCommitted(long writePointer,
                              Set<ChangeId> changes,
                              long nextWritePointer,
                              boolean canCommit)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.COMMITTED state.

      • createAborted

        public static TransactionEdit createAborted(long writePointer,
                            TransactionType type,
                            long[] checkpointPointers)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.ABORTED state.

      • createInvalid

        public static TransactionEdit createInvalid(long writePointer)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.INVALID state.

      • createMoveWatermark

        public static TransactionEdit createMoveWatermark(long writePointer)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.MOVE_WATERMARK state.

      • createTruncateInvalidTx

        public static TransactionEdit createTruncateInvalidTx(Set<Long> truncateInvalidTx)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.TRUNCATE_INVALID_TX state.

      • createTruncateInvalidTxBefore

        public static TransactionEdit createTruncateInvalidTxBefore(long truncateInvalidTxTime)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.TRUNCATE_INVALID_TX state.

      • createCheckpoint

        public static TransactionEdit createCheckpoint(long writePointer,
                               long parentWritePointer)
        Creates a new instance in the TransactionEdit.State.CHECKPOINT state.
